prune(ActionTree) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.power.AthenaPower

prune(ActionTree) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.power.HeraPower
This method sets all win flags on the peripheral spaces to false, checked also if the other player can loses if not wins.
prune(ActionTree, Board, Player) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.power.LimusPower
This method erases from the tree all build actions with target spaces adjacent to Limus's worker.
prune(ActionTree, Worker) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.power.HypnusPower
This method erases every possibility of the blocked worker to do action pruning the action tree.

publishAction(int, Action) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
checks that it is the requesting client's turn and that the proposed action is possible if the checks go well, executes it and wakes a waiting thread

publishCards(int, List<Integer>) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
checks that the request to publish the cards is legit, by checking: that the chooser is the first player that the cards have not yet been chosen that the number of cards being chosen matches the number of players if the request passes these checks, memorizes the chosen cards and notifies the choice through the feed Moreover, if the request is accepted awakes a thread that was waiting This is useful because when these cards are requested the requesting threads go in wait if the cards haven't been chosen yet
publishCards(int, List<Integer>) - Method in interface it.polimi.ingsw.controller.ControllerInterface
tells the controller the numbers of the cards chosen by the first players
publishCards(int, List<Integer>) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.middleware.Client
Communicated a list of selected cards.
